meta.name: Create Data-Driven SEO Content Briefs with AI Analysis of SERP Data using Bright Data

options.title: SEO Content Strategist
options.subtitle: Generate a strategic content brief based on SERP analysis.

parameters.initialMessages:
Welcome.
I am your AI Content Strategist. Provide a target keyword, and I will analyze the top 10 search results to generate a detailed content plan designed to outrank the competition.

parameters.message: Starting content extraction from top-ranking pages.
All data collected. Synthesizing insights and generating your strategic content plan.

nodes.name: Access and extract data from a specific URL

messageValues.message: You are an SEO expert:|Output in JSON without any comments** summary: summarize this page.

=Your objective is to analyze the provided JSON data and generate a structured summary in English, formatted using Markdown.

Strictly adhere to the following structure and formatting rules for the output:

Main Title: Start with a level 1 Markdown heading: # Content Strategy Analysis

Search Intent Section:

Create a level 2 heading: ## Search Intent

Below it, create an unordered list with the following items, extracted directly from the JSON:

The value of search_intent.primary_intent.

The value of search_intent.description.

The value of global_intent.

Must-Cover Topics Section:

Create a level 2 heading: ## Must-Cover Topics

Below it, iterate through the must_cover_topics array. For each object in the array, create a list item formatted as: **[title]:** [reasoning]

Differentiation Suggestions Section:

Create a level 2 heading: ## Differentiation Suggestions

Below it, iterate through the differentiation_suggestions array. For each object in the array, create a list item formatted as: **[suggestion]:** [reasoning]

Suggested Outline Section:

Create a level 2 heading: ## Suggested H2 Outline

Below it, iterate through the suggested_h2_outline array. For each object in the array, create a list item formatted as: **[h2_title]:** [description]

Do not include any introductory or concluding phrases. The output must only contain the formatted analysis based on the JSON.

parameters.content:
# SEO content Planner

 **Google SERP Analysis**  
   The [n8n](https://n8n.partnerlinks.io/build) workflow retrieves the **top 10 Google search results** for a given keyword using Bright Data.  
   ðŸ‘‰ Get your free Bright Data API key here: [https://get.brightdata.com/scrap](https://get.brightdata.com/scrap)

 **Content Extraction & Cleaning**  
   It scrapes each result, cleans the HTML, and extracts structured data such as titles, meta descriptions, headings, and word count for analysis.

 **Strategic Content Plan Generation**  
   AI models analyze the scraped data to determine search intent, identify essential topics, detect content gaps, and produce a strategic H2 outline for SEO content planning.

main.node: Access and extract data from a specific URL
